summary: A man takes a job at an asylum with hopes of freeing his imprisoned wife.
cast: Masuo Inoue|Ayako Iijima|Yoshie Nakagawa|Hiroshi Nemoto|Misao Seki|Minoru Takase|Eiko Minami|Kyosuke Takamatsu|Tetsu Tsuboi|Shintarô Takiguchi
keywords: mental illness|madness|insane asylum|father daughter relationship|husband wife relationship
title: Kurutta ippêji
